en-US.description: Inteface with chatGPT using voice! The openAI powered chatbot will respond to your queries and even maintain a conversation with you.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask jee pee tee a question
Alexa, ask jee pee tee about our solar system
en-US.name: Gee Pee Tee (chatGPT)
en-US.summary: A relay to chatGPT, the openAI powered chatbot.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: You can test this skill by saying, Alexa, ask jee pee tee a question, and then asking a follow up question
